dao.name: QRY_RVTYPE_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod ,type, typ_nam, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from rvtyp_rf where athena_id = ?

dao.name: QRY_RVTYPE_FIND_ONE_TYPE
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod ,type, typ_nam, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from rvtyp_rf where athena_id = ? and type = ?
